channel.title: Fabrice Pancrate on
channel.description: Recent content in Fabrice Pancrate on

item.title: Pancrate prepares for departure as promotion party looms
item.description: Pancrate - Will more than likely depart St.James’ at the end of the season Fabrice Pancrate arrived on a free from France earlier this season and on his full debut, scored an absolute screamer to seal a very good three points at home to Watford. It was a brilliant bit of skill from the 30 year-old but since then, we’ve seen very little of the former PSG winger. In fact, Pancrate is reportedly already making plans for life after Newcastle United and indeed when our Coca Cola Championship campaign comes to an end.
